recipesJson.name: KRUCIAL ○●○Sour Patch Bastards○●○
recipesJson.author: KRUCIAL
recipesJson.description: This is the 3rd version of this recipe and screams Sour Patch. All the flavors work so well together to create a wonderful cady vape. This profile is not really my style but I love it when I need a break from bakerys. I hope you all enjoy it. Please rate and comment. Thanks

reviews.text: Good recipe, but I've never liked the blue ras cotton candy. Im gonna switch it out with maybe LB blue ras och fw? Anyways, nice!
I wonder how FLV's Sour Apple would play here.

This mix reminds me of clever vapes dipstick which used to be in my rotation when I wanted something light and tart. I mixed this expecting sour patch kids and was pleasantly surprised when it tasted like one of my old ADVs. thanks for the recipe man I am really enjoying this. I made a 10 ml tester tried it today and immediate mixed a 120ml!
